name: dizziness_fainting_symptom
title: Parkinson Dizziness/Fainting Symptom Assessment
description: Assessment of Parkinson Dizziness/Fainting (existence and numeric evaluation); e.g. scoring with NMS,NMSS, MDS-NMS, or MDS_UPDRS questionnaire/scales

feature.name: periodStart
feature.title: Assessment date or start date of assessment period
feature.description: Assessment date (if periodEnd is not given) or start date of assessment period

feature.name: method
feature.title: Assessment method
feature.description: Code for the assessment method used e.g. nms: Non-Motor Rating Scale(NMS), nmss: Non-Motor Symptoms Scale for Parkinsonâ€™s Disease(NMSS), mds-nms: MDS-NMS, mds-updrs: MDS-UPDRS

feature.name: isSymptomSeen
feature.title: Is Dizziness/Fainting seen
feature.description: Whether Dizziness/Fainting is seen during the given period

feature.name: symptomScore
feature.title: Dizziness/Fainting assessment score
feature.description: Dizziness/Fainting assessment score (e.g. calculated from NMS, Part G, Range: 0-32, or NMSS, Domain 2.4, Range: 0-16, or MDS-UPDRS Diziness evaluation, Question 1.12, Range:0-4)
